name: Osaka Castle
comment: Impressive reconstructed castle with history museum and cherry blossoms

name: Abeno Harukas
comment: Sky-high views from Japan's tallest skyscraper and mall

name: Umeda Sky Building
comment: Architectural marvel with floating garden observatory panoramas

name: Shitenno-ji Temple
comment: Ancient Buddhist temple with pagoda and serene gardens

name: Sumiyoshi Taisha
comment: Oldest shrine; distinctive straight-line bridge and festival site

name: Tsutenkaku Tower
comment: Iconic tower in retro Shinsekai district with observation deck

name: Osaka Aquarium Kaiyukan
comment: World-class aquarium with giant whale sharks and immersive tanks

name: Tempozan Ferris Wheel
comment: Giant waterfront Ferris wheel offering harbour views

name: Osaka Museum of History
comment: Modern museum tracing Osaka's past through interactive exhibits

name: National Bunraku Theater
comment: Traditional puppet theatre showcasing Japanese bunraku performances

name: National Art Museum
comment: Underground museum featuring modern and contemporary art

name: Minoo Park
comment: Forest park with waterfall and vibrant autumn foliage

name: Osaka Mint Bureau
comment: Riverside museum famous for cherry-blossom tunnel

name: Hozenji Temple
comment: Tiny moss-covered temple hidden off lantern-lit alley

name: Hozenji Yokocho
comment: Atmospheric stone alley lined with izakaya and lanterns

name: Nakanoshima Park
comment: Riverside park with rose garden and cultural buildings

name: Utsubo Park
comment: Urban oasis known for tennis courts and roses

name: Kids Plaza Osaka
comment: Interactive museum encouraging hands-on play and exploration

name: Osaka Science Museum
comment: Four-floor museum with planetarium and fun experiments

name: Osaka Tenmangu Shrine
comment: Historic shrine hosting Tenjin Matsuri festival

name: Takashimaya Osaka
comment: High-end department store famed for food hall
